name: Scaling Poppet
summary: Your construction integrates ropes, hooks, or other tools to help you move across steep surfaces.
description:
Your construction integrates ropes, hooks, or other tools to help you move across steep surfaces. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet.Traits

Poppet: Small constructs originally designed to serve as companions or servants. They occasionally gain a greater spark of life, transforming them into independent, sapient creatures.
